<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="imitation_i">Imitation</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#imitation_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#imitation</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">The practice of poets and prose-writers reworking the words, stylistic features, and themes of the authors who preceded them as a way of expressing awareness of their literary heritage. In the Renaissance period, it was not regarded as plagiarism but as essential to the creation of an original literary work.</p>
  </div>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="KB_caro_i">KB caro</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#KB_caro_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#KB_caro</a>
    </div>
  <ul>
    <h4>Class</h4>
    <li>
      <a class="class" href="../arg/#KnowledgeBase_c" title="https://w3id.org/contro/arg#KnowledgeBase">Knowledge Base</a><span class="sup" data-text="c" title="Class"></span>
    </li>
  </ul>
  </div>
  </div>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="KB_castelvetro_i">KB castelvetro</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#KB_castelvetro_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#KB_castelvetro</a>
    </div>
  <ul>
    <h4>Class</h4>
    <li>
      <a class="class" href="../arg/#KnowledgeBase_c" title="https://w3id.org/contro/arg#KnowledgeBase">Knowledge Base</a><span class="sup" data-text="c" title="Class"></span>
    </li>
  </ul>
  </div>
  </div>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="latinisms_i">Latinisms</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#latinisms_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#latinisms</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Loanwords from written Latin that are artificially introduced into Italian through phonetic and morphological adaptation, as opposed to hereditary words, which result naturally from uninterrupted phonetic evolution. Latinisms are often employed in poetic texts to elevate the stylistic register.</p>
  </div>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">

    </li>
  </ul>
  </div>
  </div>

  <p class="description">Latin words are foreign to Italian speakers.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Poich le parole latine sono straniere a vulgari
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Since Latin words are foreign to vernacular speakers
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> they are permitted not only to use those that are foreign and common in the country, as these are
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span>  lor concesso dusar quelle che son forestiere e pratiche del paese, come son queste
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>

      <a class="individual" href="#s16_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s16</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Learning involves emulating principles, not mimicking results.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Non sarebbe pazzo uno che, volendo imparare di caminare da un altro, gli andasse sempre dietro, mettendo i piedi appunto donde colui gli lieva?
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Wouldnt a man be mad who, wishing to learn how to walk from another, always followed behind him, placing his feet precisely where the other had just lifted his?
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">

  </summary>
  <div class="extra">

        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> La medesima pazzia  quella che dite voi, a voler che si facciano i medesimi passi, e non il medesimo andare del Petrarca.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> That is the same kind of madness you speak of, in wanting to make the same steps, and not the same walk, as Petrarch.
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">

      <a class="individual" href="#s18_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s18</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Literary imitation should emulate the authors judgment, not reproduce their words.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="object_property" href="../arg/#contradicts_op" title="https://w3id.org/contro/arg#contradicts">contradicts</a><span class="sup" data-text="op" title="Object Property"></span> <a class="individual" href="#r2_i" title="https://w3id.org/contro/data#r2">r2</a><span class="sup" data-text="i" title="Individual"></span>
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Imitar lui vuol dire che si deve portar la persona e le gambe come egli fece; e non porre l piedi nelle sue stesse pedate
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> To imitate him means to carry oneself and move ones legs as he did, not to place ones feet in his very footprints
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s19_i">s19</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s19_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s19</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">To limit authors ability to interpret and develop the language by binding it to past usage is akin to denying the contemporary Church its role in interpreting and expanding upon sacred Scripture.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Questo  sentir nella lingua quel medesimo appunto che nella fede: cio che nel Petrarca e nel Boccaccio si termini tutta la favella volgare, come negli Evangeli ed in san Paolo tutta la sacra Scrittura.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> This is to hold in matters of language the very same belief one holds in matters of faith: to claim that vernacular Italian should be confined to Petrarch and Boccaccio, just as to claim that sacred Scripture is wholly contained in the Gospels and Saint Paul.
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">

    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Other authors of his time used those words.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> conciofossecosach al suo tempo fossero state usate forse tutte, ma senza dubbio la maggior parte, dagli scrittori
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> non vi contentarete voi del giudizio, dellautorit e dellessempio di quelli che sono i maestri dellarte dello scrivere, dai quali hanno imparato il Petrarca e tutti gli altri buoni scrittori
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> since they had perhaps all, or at least most, been used by writers of his time
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> would you not be satisfied with the judgment, authority, and example of those who are the masters of the art of writing, the very ones from whom Petrarch and all other good writers have learned
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

      </li>

      </li>
      <li>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s30_i">s30</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s30_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s30</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">The words Caro used were not legitimized by common usage.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> nor because those words have been received and made familiar among vernacular speakers
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> n perch quelle sieno state ricevute e dimesticate tra vulgari
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s31_i">s31</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s31_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s31</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Caro inserted those words gratuitously, revealing a failure of poetic judgment.</p>
  </div>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s32_i">s32</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s32_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s32</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Quintilian supports the formation of Latin words after the model of Greek ones.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> he does not mean it universally of words from every kind of foreign language, but specifically of words newly coined by the orator following the manner of a foreign  tongue.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> he means his daring as fortunate only within the bounds of the Latin language, as far as vocabulary is concerned;
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> he refers to the formation of Latin words after the model of Greek ones, and not to the importing of foreign words  into another language,
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> intende dellarditezza di lui aventurosa solamente dentro da termini della lingua latina quanto appartiene alle voci;
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> intende egli della formazione delle parole latine a similitudine delle greche, e non del portare le forestiere  in unaltra lingua,
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> non intende universalmente delle voci dogni maniera di lingua forestiera, ma particolarmente delle voci formate di nuovo dal favellatore secondo la maniera della lingua  straniera.
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s33_i">s33</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s33_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s33</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Varro allows poets greater freedom than orators in forming words by morphological analogy rather than by common usage.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> potendo il poeta transilire lineas impune, cio passare il segno, il che  interpretato da Varrone medesimo che il poeta pu pi liberamente seguire lanalogia nelle parole che non pu il favellatore;
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> the poet is allowed to transilire lineas impune, or pass the mark, which Varro himself interprets to mean that the poet may follow analogy in words more freely than the orator can;
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s34_i">s34</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s34_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s34</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Quintilian and Varro represent the consensus of the masters of rhetoric on linguistic matters.</p>
  </div>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s35_i">s35</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s35_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s35</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">The masters of rhetoric endorse new word formation after the model of foreign words, not the usage of foreign words themselves.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="object_property" href="../arg/#contradicts_op" title="https://w3id.org/contro/arg#contradicts">contradicts</a><span class="sup" data-text="op" title="Object Property"></span> <a class="individual" href="#s11_i" title="https://w3id.org/contro/data#s11">s11</a><span class="sup" data-text="i" title="Individual"></span>
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> in vain does Caro bring forth the authority of the eminent masters of rhetoric and poetry in their support, some of whom do not speak of this kind of foreign words, and some do speak of them, but deny their use or do not allow it in this case
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> vanamente si producono dal Caro per sostegno loro lautorit de valenti maestri di ritorica e di poesia, alcuni de quali non parlano di questa maniera di parole strane e alcuni ne parlano s, ma niegano luso loro o non lo concedono in questo caso
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s36_i">s36</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s36_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s36</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Horace teaches that usage is the arbiter of the survival and demise of words within a language.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> La podest del quale uso  molto grande nel generar vocaboli e nel ravivare i gi morti e nellabbattere gli onorati, s come dice Orazio
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> The power of usage is indeed great in generating new words, in reviving the dead, and in bringing down those that are honored, as Horace says
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> it does not follow in the case of Horace because he calls usage the begetter of words, or because he says that many words now dead will be reborn, and many that are esteemed will fall into this condition
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> non si concede ci per Orazio perch egli chiami luso generator delle parole, o perch dica che molte parole gi morte rinasceranno, e molte, che sono in pregio, cadranno con questa condizione
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s37_i">s37</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s37_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s37</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Horace acknowledges the writers license to coin new words through individual ingenuity.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> as all this liberty in coining words depends entirely on the ingenious daring of the writer
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> pendendo del tutto questo lecito coniamento de vocaboli dallardire ingegnoso dello scrittore
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<div class="admonition individual" markdown>
  <div class="admonition-title overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s38_i">s38</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s38_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s38</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Latinisms are not products of usage but artificial formations introduced by the author.</p>
  </div>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s39_i">s39</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s39_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s39</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">The legitimacy of Latinisms in Italian poetry depends solely on the ingenuity of the author.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="object_property" href="../arg/#contradicts_op" title="https://w3id.org/contro/arg#contradicts">contradicts</a><span class="sup" data-text="op" title="Object Property"></span> <a class="individual" href="#s14_i" title="https://w3id.org/contro/data#s14">s14</a><span class="sup" data-text="i" title="Individual"></span>
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> La podest del quale uso  molto grande nel generar vocaboli e nel ravivare i gi morti e nellabbattere gli onorati, s come dice Orazio, ma  picciola o nulla nel producere voci artificiose per significazione o per formazione
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> The power of usage is indeed great in generating new words, in reviving the dead, and in bringing down those that are honored, as Horace says, but it is slight or null when it comes to producing artificial words either by signification or by formation
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> as all this liberty in coining words depends entirely on the ingenious daring of the writer, and not on the force of prevailing usage
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> pendendo del tutto questo lecito coniamento de vocaboli dallardire ingegnoso dello scrittore e non dalla forza del potente uso
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s4_i">s4</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s4_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s4</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Petrarch is an authority in Italian literature.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> I grant that the perfection of stylethough never fully realized in practicehas, up to now, been found in our language particularly in Petrarch and Boccaccio.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Voglio che la perfezion del dire (ancora che non si dia interamente in atto) sia in fino a ora in questa lingua, spezialmente nel Petrarca e nel Boccaccio
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> avendo il Petrarca per principe de poeti in questa lingua e per degno di riverenza e dammirazione a tutte laltre.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> since he holds Petrarch as the prince of poets in our language, worthy of reverence and admiration above all others.
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s40_i">s40</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s40_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s40</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Pietro Bembo is a master of discernment in imitation for Italian literature.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> And in this respect, our language owes perpetual gratitude to Bembo, for he taught us how to proceed in this way, and restrained the boldness of those who transgressed too licentiously in this matter
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> E in questo ha spezialmente la nostra favella perpetuo obligo col Bembo, perch ninsegn la via di cos fare, e raffren laudacia di coloro che troppo licenziosamente in ci trascorrevano
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> one must select certain authoritative writers to trust regarding the choice of words; or rather, one should acknowledge those that Messer Pietro Bembo has already selected
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> sono da sciegliere certi scrittori dautorit a quali si possa prestar fede nellelezione delle parole; o pi tosto sono da riconoscere i gi scielti da messer Pietro Bembo
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s41_i">s41</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s41_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s41</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Bembo argues that only the best authors of the 14th century, in their finished and approved works, are worthy of imitation.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> I refrain from placing much trust in this regard in Lorenzo de Medici, in Angelo Poliziano, or in any other more recent author, since I do so on the advice of Bembo himself
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> I volumi adunque riprovati da gli loro quantunque degni scrittori, o lasciatici imperfetti, o ripresi liberamente dal Bembo quanto  alla lingua, o trapassati per lui sotto taciturnit non ci possono rendere sicuri da biasimo se riempieremo i nostri scritti delle loro voci
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Volumes, then, disavowed by their authors, however worthy, left to us incomplete, freely criticized by Bembo with regard to their language, or passed over by him in silence, cannot shield us from reproach if we fill our writings with their words
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> giudica essere il Boccaccio lottimo prosatore e l Petrarca lottimo rimatore, e amenduni gli ultimi in tempo da essere creduti
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> he judges Boccaccio to be the finest prose writer, Petrarch the finest poet, and both the most recent in time to be worthy of consideration
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> io mi ritrarr da dar molta credenza in questa parte a Lorenzo de Medici, o ad Angelo Poliziano, o ad alcun altro pi moderno, poi che lo far consigliato da esso Bembo
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s5_i">s5</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s5_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s5</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Those words should not be used.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> I have marked them as not suited to be employed in this canzone
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> s come non acconcie ad essere adoperate in questa canzone sono state da me segnate
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s6_i">s6</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s6_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s6</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">There is no direct knowledge of Petrarchs intention.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> But in saying outright that he would not use them, one must consider whether you have reliable authority on the matter, and what exactly you know of it; whether, by chance, as you so freely dispense the name and wisdom of Petrarch, his very spirit has entered your body.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Ma, dicendo affermativamente non luserebbe, bisogna intender se lavete di buon loco, e quel che voi ne sapete; se per aventura spacciando, come fate, il nome e l senno del Petrarca, vi fosse entrato il suo spirito in corpo
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s7_i">s7</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s7_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s7</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">Castelvetro is not a reliable interpreter of Petrarchs mind.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> But in saying outright that he would not use them, one must consider whether you have reliable authority on the matter, and what exactly you know of it; whether, by chance, as you so freely dispense the name and wisdom of Petrarch, his very spirit has entered your body.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Ma, dicendo affermativamente non luserebbe, bisogna intender se lavete di buon loco, e quel che voi ne sapete; se per aventura spacciando, come fate, il nome e l senno del Petrarca, vi fosse entrato il suo spirito in corpo
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>
  <summary>
  <div class="overview">
    <div class="label">
      <h3 id="s8_i">s8</h3>
      <a class="individual" href="#s8_i">https://w3id.org/contro/data#s8</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <p class="description">It is not possible to know whether Petrarch would have used those words.</p>
  </summary>
  <div class="extra">
    <ul>
      <h4>Assertions</h4>
      <li>
        <a class="object_property" href="../arg/#contradicts_op" title="https://w3id.org/contro/arg#contradicts">contradicts</a><span class="sup" data-text="op" title="Object Property"></span> <a class="individual" href="#r1_i" title="https://w3id.org/contro/data#r1">r1</a><span class="sup" data-text="i" title="Individual"></span>
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> But if it is merely something you say and imagine on your own, I am under no obligation to believe it, and your imagination carries no weight.
      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> Ma, quando lo diciate e ve limaginiate da voi, al vostro detto non sono obligato di credere, e la vostra imaginazione non fa caso.
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<details class="individual" name="element" markdown>

      </li>
      <li>
        <a class="data_property" href="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value" title="http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#value">value</a><span class="sup" data-text="dp" title="Data Property"></span> would you not be satisfied with the judgment, authority, and example of those who are the masters of the art of writing, the very ones from whom Petrarch and all other good writers have learned
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>
